profiles.name: Raymond
profiles.description: Life is little to nothing.  But we're still to search hope of being different from our ancestors.  Either we can avoid from anything wrong done by our ancestors, or we get things right to have a better life.  We sometimes may witness that, 'Only a life lived for others is a life worthwhile!'

profiles.name: Kimi
profiles.description: 分享比享受更能愉悅人的心靈和本性，只是它的外表看起來沒甚麼好。太過執著，猶如握得疆硬的拳頭，失去了鬆解的自在和超脫。要常常喜樂，不住的禱告，凡事謝恩；因為這是神在基督耶穌裡向你們所定的旨意。

occasion.name: Raymond Yau & Kimi Cheng Marriage Registration & Celebrate
